person.persName: Charles Scott Todd Bodley (Lexington, Kentucky, bookseller and sheriff)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, bookseller and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Frances Price Curd Bodley. Father of Eleanor H. Bodley, Catherine S. Bodley, and Ann R. Bodley. Bookseller in Fayette County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1850. Bookseller in Fayette County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1860. Hired one additional enslaved person in Fayette County in 1860. Sheriff of Fayette County from 1862 to 1863.
